long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block porn in Chrome with this simple, free extension.
A simple and free solution to prevent access to inappropriate sites while using Chrome.

By adding Porn Blocker to Chrome, you'll benefit from:

- Automatic redirection to a help page when attempting to access porn sites.
- A personal log documenting each attempt to access pornographic content.

Our catalog of blocked sites continues to grow!


Are you the partner of someone striving to overcome a porn addiction? XBlockSafety may help you with it!

If you find our porn blocker helpful, please consider leaving a positive review in the Chrome Store!
